title: What ranks did you guys place in Flex with the new reset?
body:
I went 5/5 originally (D5 S6), placed in Plat 1. I played 60 games with 65% win rate and got to Diamond 1 75LP. Today, I won my placement and placed in Gold II :):)

How did you guys go!

replies.body: Hey guys I know it's confusing, check the latest updates here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues
Thanks, I know you got our backs, and will sort this out. I feel like this reset didn't even acknowledge any previous games we played in flex though

I think you're right about that. Most people got placed wildly inaccurately after their first flex placements, so I'd say the change ignored those games entirely since in the vast majority of cases they were useless for determining rank.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uy7ElHzI,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-11-15T03:58:46.755+0000)
>
> I think you're right about that. Most people got placed wildly inaccurately after their first flex placements, so I'd say the change ignored those games entirely since in the vast majority of cases they were useless for determining rank.

If that's true then those of us that played 10 'clown fiesta games' only to be placed somewhere stupid are having our entire placements judged off of one single game.

Those that also played x number of 'clown fiesta' games after being placed incorrectly, also are having their seed determined by one game only.

The solution seems simple to me. Just do a complete reset back to S6 end of season ranks, 10 fresh placement games for all. Have no MMR loss or drop, except for those plat and above (treat them like G1 75LP as if they decayed LP wise, while they retain their behind the scenes MMR).
I don't really know the details sorry, I can only speculate like the rest of you. All I can say is that any updates will be in Maraudaur's thread or Gehirn's announcement.
There is no updates there ?? I personally dont care about the reset, I care about the match making so I can actually climb..
After the fix this morning and 1 placement match. Match making should be better. Let me know if you see otherwise.

I feel like this system took our original season 6 MMR, ignoring everything else, and dropped us down ~1 tier to place us, or 1 tier and 1 division based on a loss. It's really sad when I go from playing challenging games against challengers and the best players in OCE to playing what I consider much less meaningless games against much lower players in gold and plat. I honestly would be desperate to just have our original 10 placements back, so I could place reasonably again
this made everything much worse wtf

EXACT same issue played already 40 games climbed from Silver 3 to Gold 5  then i play 1 placement game and get put in bronze 2 this is utter garbage. I wasted my weekend time getting to gold in preseason only to be put in bronze off one game ......

The actual weird thing about this is oce is the only one that is rolling this out wtf ???

Ended last season p4 (after a massive tilt streak, from diamond series to p5 over a couple of days lmao), -> Initial placements: Gold v -> lost my 1 "placement fix" game: gold v. 

Not bad at all :D

IT MAKES NO SENSE!! and theirs no explanation of what the flex problem is that their trying to fix !

I went from S1 60 Lp to s3 0 lp on a game i won =( sour.
Be thankful its only 3 tiers. Ive herd of guys dropping from Silver 3 to Bronze 5 after a win.
